item.title: gdb一丢丢常见问题
item.description: 一、gdb 无法自动加载当前文件 .gdbinit文件 提示： warning: File “/home/heidong/privt/proj/osv6/.gdbinit” auto-loading has been declined by your `auto-load safe-path’ set to “$debugdir:$datadir/auto-load”. To enable execution of this file add add-auto-load-safe-path /home/heidong/privt/proj/osv6/.gdbinit line to your configuration file “/home/heidong/.gdbinit”. To completely disable this security protection add set auto-load safe-path / line to
